channel.title: CVE Feed for MGT-COMMERCE -- CloudPanel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MGT-COMMERCE -- CloudPanel

item.title: CVE-2023-0391|2023-03-23T18:36:43.772Z -- mgt-commerce -- cloudpanel
item.description: MGT-COMMERCE CloudPanel ships with a static SSL certificate to encrypt communications to the administrative interface, shared across every installation of CloudPanel. This behavior was observed in version 2.2.0. There has been no indication from the vendor this has been addressed in version 2.2.1.
